name: Pro Pinball: Timeshock!
description:
Pro Pinball: Timeshock! is an action-arcade game developed by Cunning Developments and Another Cunning Development. It was originally released in 1997. Empire Interactive Entertainment published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Pro Pinball: Timeshock! is available on PlayStation, Classic Macintosh and PC.
Jake Burns scored the game.
